name: Health and Safety
description:
صحة وعافية!
A game for Tafra Game Jam 2021 - Theme "Infection"

I preferred to portray infection in a more positive and "healthy" way.

You are a cure that moves in the air. Use your Sanitizing Skills to Move and Disinfect the Red cells.

Please do not quit before the Soap level :D

Controls:

  • Keyboard 1,2,3,4,5: Choose a skill. (or just Click on its icon).
  • WASD, Arrow Keys, or Swipe: Move (4-Directions).

Walkthrough: Check this Video.

Good Luck, and Stay Safe!
